com.uploadcare.android.library.api

Class FilesQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uploadcare.android.library.api.FilesQueryBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaginatedQueryBuilder<UploadcareFile>

    public class FilesQueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaginatedQueryBuilder<UploadcareFile>
    File resource request builder. Allows to specify some file filters and get results. UploadcareFile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilesQueryBuilder(UploadcareClient client)
      Initializes a new builder for the given client.

      • removed

        public FilesQueryBuilder removed(boolean removed)
        Adds a filter for removed files.
        Parameters:
        removed - If true, accepts removed files, otherwise declines them.

      • stored

        public FilesQueryBuilder stored(boolean stored)
        Adds a filter for stored files.
        Parameters:
        stored - If true, accepts stored files, otherwise declines them.

      • from

        public FilesQueryBuilder from(java.util.Date from)
        Adds a filter for datetime from objects will be returned.
        Parameters:
        from - A uploading datetime from which objects will be returned.

      • to

        public FilesQueryBuilder to(java.util.Date to)
        Adds a filter for datetime to which objects will be returned.
        Parameters:
        to - A uploading datetime to which objects will be returned.

      • asListAsync

        public void asListAsync(android.content.Context context,
                        int limit,
                        java.net.URI next,
                        UploadcareFilesCallback callback)
        Returns a limited amount of resources with specified offset Asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        context - application context. @link android.content.Context
        limit - amount of resources returned in callback.
        next - amount of resources to skip. if null then no offset will be applied.
        callback - UploadcareFilesCallback.

      • asListAsync
